scripts.dev: rm -rf next.config.js && cp next_config/local_dev.config.js next.config.js && next dev
scripts.local_static: rm -rf next.config.js && cp next_config/local_static.config.js next.config.js && yarn static
scripts.gh_static: rm -rf next.config.js && cp next_config/gh_static.config.js next.config.js && yarn static
scripts.gh-pages: yarn gh_static && cp .nojekyll out/.nojekyll && gh-pages -d out -m 'feat: pushes gh-pages docs' -t true
